org.springframework.mobile.device.site

Interface SitePreferenceRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CookieSitePreferenceRepository

    public interface SitePreferenceRepository
    A strategy for storing a user's site preference. Supports allowing the user to explicitly choose which site they want e.g. 'normal', 'mobile', or 'tablet'.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SitePreference loadSitePreference(HttpServletRequest request)
      Load the user's site preference.
      void saveSitePreference(SitePreference preference, HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
      Save the user's site preference.

    • Method Detail

      • loadSitePreference

        SitePreference loadSitePreference(HttpServletRequest request)
        Load the user's site preference. Returns null if the user has not specified a preference.

      • saveSitePreference

        void saveSitePreference(SitePreference preference,
                      HttpServletRequest request,
                      HttpServletResponse response)
        Save the user's site preference.
